verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me again saying

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What לָּכֶ֗ם la-Chem, אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you מֹֽשְׁלִים֙ <S%H4911><s%> mo-she-Lim What mean ye that ye use אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמָּשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> ham-ma-Shal this proverb הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> a-Vot The fathers יֹ֣אכְלוּ <S%H398><s%> Yo-che-lu have eaten בֹ֔סֶר <S%H1155><s%> Vo-ser, sour grapes וְשִׁנֵּ֥י <S%H8127><s%> ve-shin-Nei teeth הַבָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> hab-ba-Nim and the children's תִּקְהֶֽינָה׃ <S%H6949><s%> tik-Hei-nah. are set on edge

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- [As] I live אָ֕נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- are surely יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, anymore מְשֹׁ֛ל <S%H4911><s%> me-Shol ye shall not have [occasion] any more to use הַמָּשָׁ֥ל <S%H4912><s%> ham-ma-Shal this proverb הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַנְּפָשׁוֹת֙ <S%H5315><s%> han-ne-fa-shOt Behold all souls לִ֣י li הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah, in כְּנֶ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ke-Ne-fesh are mine as the soul הָאָ֛ב <S%H1><s%> ha-'Av of the father וּכְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> u-che-Ne-fesh so also the soul הַבֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> hab-Ben of the son לִי־ li- הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah; in הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh is mine the soul הַחֹטֵ֖את <S%H2398><s%> ha-cho-Tet that sinneth הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he תָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut. it shall die ס sa-Mek

וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish But if a man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik; be just וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah. and right

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim upon the mountains לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo and does not אָכָ֔ל <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal, [And] hath not eaten וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nav his eyes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or נָשָׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa, neither hath lifted up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lei to the idols בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu his neighbour's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or טִמֵּ֔א <S%H2930><s%> tim-Me, neither hath defiled וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah woman נִדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> nid-Dah to a menstruous לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo or יִקְרָֽב׃ <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav. neither hath come near

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish any לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יוֹנֶ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> yo-Neh, And hath not oppressed חֲבֹלָת֥וֹ <S%H2258><s%> cha-vo-la-To his pledge חוֹב֙ <S%H2326><s%> chOv to the debtor יָשִׁ֔יב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shiv, [but] hath restored גְּזֵלָ֖ה <S%H1500><s%> ge-ze-Lah none by violence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יִגְזֹ֑ל <S%H1497><s%> yig-Zol; hath spoiled לַחְמוֹ֙ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mo his bread לְרָעֵ֣ב <S%H7457><s%> le-ra-'Ev to the hungry יִתֵּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten, hath given וְעֵירֹ֖ם <S%H5903><s%> ve-'ei-Rom the naked יְכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-seh- and hath covered בָּֽגֶד׃ <S%H899><s%> Ba-ged. with a garment

בַּנֶּ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> ban-Ne-shech upon usury לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יִתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten, He [that] hath not given forth וְתַרְבִּית֙ <S%H8636><s%> ve-tar-Bit any increase לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or יִקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach, neither hath taken מֵעָ֖וֶל <S%H5766><s%> me-'A-vel from iniquity יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shiv [that] hath withdrawn יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; his hand מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat judgment אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met true. יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh, hath executed בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish between man לְאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish. and man

בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֧י <S%H2708><s%> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes יְהַלֵּ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-hal-Lech Hath walked וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tai my judgments שָׁמַ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mar and hath kept לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to deal אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met; truly צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik he [is] just הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he חָיֹ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> cha-Yoh he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh, live נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD

וְהוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ve-ho-Lid If he beget בֵּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- a son פָּרִ֖יץ <S%H6530><s%> pa-Ritz [that is] a robber שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> sho-Fech a shedder דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> Dam; of blood וְעָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah and [that] doeth אָ֔ח <S%H251><s%> 'Ach, the like מֵאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> me-'a-Chad to [any] one מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> me-'El-leh. of these

וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu himself אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh of these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; And that doeth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for גַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> gam again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim upon the mountains אָכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal, not any of those [duties] but even hath eaten וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu his neighbour's טִמֵּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> tim-Me. and defiled

עָנִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni the poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֙ <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-yOn and needy הוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> ho-Nah, Hath oppressed גְּזֵל֣וֹת <S%H1500><s%> ge-ze-Lot by violence גָּזָ֔ל <S%H1497><s%> ga-Zal, hath spoiled חֲבֹ֖ל <S%H2258><s%> cha-Vol the pledge לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יָשִׁ֑יב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shiv; hath not restored וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to הַגִּלּוּלִים֙ <S%H1544><s%> hag-gil-lu-Lim to the idols נָשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa and hath lifted up עֵינָ֔יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav, his eyes תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vah abomination עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. hath committed

בַּנֶּ֧שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> ban-Ne-shech upon usury נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan Hath given forth וְתַרְבִּ֥ית <S%H8636><s%> ve-tar-Bit increase לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach and hath taken וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai; shall he then live לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יִֽחְיֶ֗ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh, ;he shall not live אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַתּוֹעֵב֤וֹת <S%H8441><s%> hat-to-'e-Vot all these abominations הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, he hath done מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot he shall surely יוּמָ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat, die דָּמָ֖יו <S%H1818><s%> da-Mav his blood בּ֥וֹ <S%H99999><s%> bo יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become

וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh now behold הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid Now lo [if] he beget בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben, a son וַיַּ֕רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar that seeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חַטֹּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tot sins אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv all his father's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; which he hath done וַיִּרְאֶ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'Eh and considereth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo does not יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh and doeth כָּהֵֽן׃ <S%H2004><s%> ka-Hen. not such like

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish any לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or הוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3238><s%> ho-Nah, Neither hath oppressed חֲבֹל֙ <S%H2258><s%> cha-Vol the pledge לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or חָבָ֔ל <S%H2254><s%> cha-Val, hath not withholden וּגְזֵלָ֖ה <S%H1500><s%> u-ge-ze-Lah by violence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or גָזָ֑ל <S%H1497><s%> ga-Zal; neither hath spoiled לַחְמוֹ֙ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mo his bread לְרָעֵ֣ב <S%H7457><s%> le-ra-'Ev to the hungry נָתָ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan, [but] hath given וְעֵר֖וֹם <S%H5903><s%> ve-'e-Rom the naked כִּסָּה־ <S%H3680><s%> kis-sah- and hath covered בָֽגֶד׃ <S%H899><s%> Va-ged. with a garment

מֵעָנִ֞י <S%H6041><s%> me-'a-Ni from the poor הֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> he-Shiv [That] hath taken off יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, his hand נֶ֤שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> Ne-shech usury וְתַרְבִּית֙ <S%H8636><s%> ve-tar-Bit nor increase לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not לָקָ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach, [that] hath not received מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tai my judgments עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, hath executed בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> be-chuk-ko-Tai in my statutes הָלָ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach; hath walked ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo he will not יָמ֛וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut he shall not die בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> ba-'a-Von for the iniquity אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv of his father חָיֹ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> cha-Yoh he shall surely יִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh. live
